data.title: One of the best Taco Bells
data.text: Nicely remodeled and very clean every time I've been there.  This place is easy to get in and out of.  Food-wise, it's one of the better Taco Bells around.  I've tried almost everything on the menu and haven't had a bad meal yet.  The staff are very friendly and patient with me as I decide what to have.  Worth the trip.

data.title: When nothing else is open
data.text: When nothing is open in the early AM those burritos and tacos do taste great and are cheap, easy to eat while driving home. So when arriving home after a way too long of a flying day, (in my case, flying cargo like "critical" need stuff( car bumpers, unknown cargo, and the occasional good things like medicine), all that crazy cargo issues fade away. thank you Taco Bell for your service. Good food in a pinch is my evaluation.

data.title: Taco Bell, Downtown
data.text: On our US-trip we've stopped by at quite a few of the Taco Bell places for lunch. It's always tasty, friendly adn nice staff, Clean and usually get your food faster than at many other fast food places. Reasonable prices. You know what you get as well.
